name: Left Alone (itch) (Turkey The Squirrel)
description:
A game about a forgotten program.
3 endings. 1 game.

A / Left arrow-key, D/ Right arrow-key, Space to jump.

I am aware the first two endings are a little buggy, I'll try and fix that.

SPOILER: HOW TO GET ALL THREE ENDINGS

ending 1: finish all platforming segments and read the final message

ending 2: repeat the first step but read the different dialogue.

ending 3: at the first level keep going left.

Fonts from: www.dafont.com

Music:
